actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that veterans with disabilities rated 10 through 100 percent shall receive additional compensation for dependents.

summary.text: Provides that veterans with disabilities rated 10 through 100 percent shall receive from the Veterans' Administration additional compensation for dependents.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that veterans with disabilities rated 10 through 100 percent shall receive additional compensation for dependents.
